revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Logitech |model=Harmony Ultimate Hub |revision=(915-000216) |asin= |price=100 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |availability=common |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/03/2013 |fcc_id=JNZOR0004 |ic_id=4418A-OR0004 |pcb_id=210-001318-002 |type=WiFi IR bridge |pwr_v=5.1 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331;AR9331-AL1A, PFH094.006B, 1152, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EZNI-10G |ram1=32 MiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS16M16DS-5T |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331;AR9331-AL1A, PFH094.006B, 1152, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=none |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=Bluetooth SoC;Cambridge Silicon Radio (CSR);CSR8811;;1; ,,, Proprietary 2.4GHz Communications SoC;Texas Instruments;CC2544;;1; |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:04:20 }} {{TagLine|Logitech Harmony Ultimate Hub}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.logitech.com/product/harmony-ultimate-hub?WT.mc_id{{!!}}global_news_harmonyhub}}
"P/N: 210-001318-002", the ''[[Logitech]]'' logo, and "2012" is silkscreened on the board. :There are six IR emitters on the PCB.
This device has two non-802.11 radios... *''Proprietary 2.4 GHz RF'' - ''[[TI]]'' CC2544 *''Bluetooth 4.0'' - CSR8811
This device comes with the [http://www.logitech.com/en-us/product/harmony-smart-control?crid=60 Logitech Harmony Smart Control] and :[http://www.logitech.com/en-us/product/harmony-ultimate?crid=60 Logitech Harmony Ultimate] or on its own as :[http://www.logitech.com/en-us/product/harmony-ultimate-hub?crid=60 Logitech Harmony Ultimate Hub]
The [[Logitech Harmony Touch]] may be paired with this hub if purchased separately.
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/logitech/pimento ''Harmony Ultimate Hub "Pimento"'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :CPU: [[Atheros]] AR9331 WiSoC 802.11bgn (1x1 2.4GHz) :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L128 (16MB) :RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM6AA160TSB-5G (32MB) :WLAN: [[TI]] CC2544 (vendor-specific 2.4GHz) :Bluetooth: CSR 8811 (2.4GHz) :USB: 1x USB 2.0 port
===Models=== :;[[Logitech]] *[[Logitech Harmony Link]] *[[Logitech Harmony Touch]] *[[Logitech Harmony Ultimate]] • [http://www.logitech.com/en-us/product/harmony-ultimate?crid=60 PPage] *[[Logitech Harmony Ultimate Hub]] • [http://www.logitech.com/en-us/product/harmony-ultimate-hub?crid=60 PPage] *[[Logitech Harmony Smart Control]] • [http://www.logitech.com/en-us/product/harmony-smart-control?crid=60 PPage] *[[Logitech Harmony Express (N-R0017)]] *[[Logitech Harmony Express Remote Control (N-R0016)]]
===PSUs=== {{HasPowerSupply |brand=Logitech |model=KSAS0060510100VUD (P/N: 534-000455) |manuf_country=China |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.18 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5.1 |output_a=1.0 |output_conn=USB Male Micro-B |output_c=DC }}
